properties.name: --mdc-fab-box-shadow
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the fab. Elevation 6 when idle, 8 when focused or hovered, and 12 when active.

properties.name: --mdc-fab-extended-label-padding
properties.description: Sets the padding on either horizontal side of an extended fab.

properties.name: --mdc-fab-extended-icon-padding
properties.description: Sets the padding between the icon and the label of an extended fab.

properties.name: --mdc-fab-focus-outline-color
properties.description: The color of the focus outline ring (off by default).

properties.name: --mdc-fab-focus-outline-width
properties.description: Sets the width of the focus outline ring.

properties.name: --mdc-button-horizontal-padding
properties.description: Left and right padding of the button label (for outlined buttons the outline width is automatically subtracted).

properties.name: --mdc-button-outline-width
properties.description: `width` of the outline of an outlined button and attempts to keep the component size constant.

properties.name: --mdc-button-outline-color
properties.description: Color of the outline of an outlined element.

properties.name: --mdc-button-disabled-fill-color
properties.description: Background fill color of a disabled raised or unelevated button.

properties.name: --mdc-button-disabled-ink-color
properties.description: Text color of a disabled button as well as the outline color of a disabled outlined button.

properties.name: --mdc-button-disabled-outline-color
properties.description: Sets the color of the outline of a disabled outlined button.

properties.name: --mdc-button-raised-box-shadow
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the raised button.

properties.name: --mdc-button-raised-box-shadow-hover
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the raised button when focused or hovered.

properties.name: --mdc-button-raised-box-shadow-focus
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the raised button when focused. Note, if button is both focused and hovered, then hover will override focus box-shadow.

properties.name: --mdc-button-raised-box-shadow-active
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the raised button when active.

properties.name: --mdc-button-raised-box-shadow-disabled
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the raised button when disabled.

properties.name: --mdc-tab-height
properties.description: Height of the tab.

properties.name: --mdc-tab-horizontal-padding
properties.description: Horizontal padding on either side of the tab.

properties.name: --mdc-tab-stacked-height
properties.description: Height of the tab's stacked variant.

properties.name: --mdc-tab-text-label-color-default
properties.description: Color of an unactivated tab label.

properties.name: --mdc-tab-color-default
properties.description: Color of an unactivated icon.

properties.name: --mdc-select-error-color
properties.description: Applies where --mdc-theme-error applies.

properties.name: --mdc-select-idle-line-color
properties.description: Color of the filled select's bottom line when idle.

properties.name: --mdc-select-hover-line-color
properties.description: Color of the filled select's bottom line when hovering.

properties.name: --mdc-select-outlined-idle-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined select's outline when idle.

properties.name: --mdc-select-outlined-hover-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined select's outline when hovering.

properties.name: --mdc-select-outlined-disabled-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined select's outline when disabled.

properties.name: --mdc-select-fill-color
properties.description: Color of the select's background fill (non-outlined).

properties.name: --mdc-select-disabled-fill-color
properties.description: Color of the select's background fill (non-outlined) when disabled.

properties.name: --mdc-select-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the selected text in default and error states.

properties.name: --mdc-select-label-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the non-focused floating label, helper text, and placeholder.

properties.name: --mdc-select-focused-label-color
properties.description: Color of the focused floating label, helper text, and placeholder.

properties.name: --mdc-select-disabled-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the input text, the floating label, helper text, and placeholder of a disabled select.

properties.name: --mdc-select-dropdown-icon-color
properties.description: Color of the dropdown icon when select is not activated.

properties.name: --mdc-select-focused-dropdown-icon-color
properties.description: Color of the dropdown icon when select is activated.

properties.name: --mdc-select-disabled-dropdown-icon-color
properties.description: Opacity of the dropdown icon when disabled.

properties.name: --mdc-select-error-dropdown-icon-color
properties.description: Color of the dropdown icon when select is invalid.

properties.name: --mdc-linear-progress-buffer-color
properties.description:
Sets the color of the buffer progress bar.
**NOTE:** to change the color of the buffering dots, you must do so in the image of `--mdc-linear-progress-buffering-dots-image`.

properties.name: --mdc-linear-progress-buffering-dots-image
properties.description: Sets the image to use as the buffering dots. This pattern is then repeated horizontally and animated.

properties.name: --mdc-radio-unchecked-color
properties.description: Color of the ring of an unchecked radio.

properties.name: --mdc-radio-disabled-color
properties.description: Color of the ring and circle of a disabled radio.

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-scrim-color
properties.description: Color of the scrim. (**Note:** setting alpha to 0 will still make scrim clickable but transparent).

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-heading-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the heading text.

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-content-ink-color
properties.description: Color applied to the projected content. (**Note:** it may also be possible to style the content via the light DOM since it is not encapsulated in a shadow root).

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-scroll-divider-color
properties.description: Color of the dividers present when dialog is scrollable.

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-min-width
properties.description: min-width ofthe dialog surface.

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-max-width
properties.description: max-width of the dialog surface. (**Note:** if max-width is < `560px`, there is a visual jank bug that will occur causing the max width to be `560px` when the window is sized to <= than `560px`).

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-max-height
properties.description: Max height of the dialog surface.

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-box-shadow
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the dialog.

properties.name: --mdc-dialog-z-index
properties.description: Sets the `z-index` of the dialog and scrim.

properties.name: --mdc-ripple-color
properties.description: Color of the ripple will have when activated.

properties.name: --mdc-ripple-press-opacity
properties.description: Opacity of the ripple when pressed.

properties.name: --mdc-ripple-hover-opacity
properties.description: Opacity of the ripple when hovered.

properties.name: --mdc-ripple-focus-opacity
properties.description: Opacity of the ripple when focused.

properties.name: --mdc-ripple-selected-opacity
properties.description: Opacity of the ripple when the host component is "selected". This opacity is added to `press`, `hover`, and `focus` states.

properties.name: --mdc-ripple-activated-opacity
properties.description: Opacity of the ripple when the host component is "activated". This opacity is added to `press`, `hover`, and `focus` states.

properties.name: --mdc-ripple-z-index
properties.description: Z-index of the ripple.

properties.name: --mdc-top-app-bar-fixed-box-shadow
properties.description: Sets the box shadow of the fixed top app bar when scrolling.

properties.name: --mdc-top-app-bar-width
properties.description: Width of the `top-app-bar` in relation to the Window.

properties.name: --mdc-snackbar-action-color
properties.description: Color of the action button text.

properties.name: --mdc-top-app-bar-width
properties.description: Width of the `top-app-bar` in relation to the Window.

properties.name: --mdc-circular-progress-track-color
properties.description: Sets the track color of the determinate progress bar.

properties.name: --mdc-icon-button-size
properties.description: Sets the size of the button wrapping the icon.

properties.name: --mdc-icon-font
properties.description: Font that supports *ligatures* and determines which icons are available (see [fonts](#fonts) above).

properties.name: --mdc-icon-size
properties.description: Size of the icon.

properties.name: --mdc-text-area-filled-border-radius
properties.description: Border radius of the standard / filled textarea's background filling.

properties.name: --mdc-text-area-outlined-idle-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textarea's outline when idle.

properties.name: --mdc-text-area-outlined-hover-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textarea's outline when hovering.

properties.name: --mdc-text-area-outlined-disabled-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textarea's outline when disabled.

properties.name: --mdc-elevation-overlay-opacity
properties.description: Opacity of the overlay.

properties.name: --mdc-elevation-overlay-fill-color
properties.description: Fill color of the overlay.

properties.name: --mdc-elevation-overlay-width
properties.description: Width of the overlay (`absolute` positioning may need to be set as well e.g. `.mdc-elevation-overlay {--mdc-elevation-overlay-width: 50%; left: 50%;}`).

properties.name: --mdc-elevation-overlay-height
properties.description: Height of the overlay (`absolute` positioning may need to be set as well e.g. `.mdc-elevation-overlay {--mdc-elevation-overlay-height: 50%; top: 50%;}`).

properties.name: --mdc-checkbox-ink-color
properties.description: Color of mark inside a `checked` or `indeterminate` checkbox (enabled or disabled).

properties.name: --mdc-checkbox-unchecked-color
properties.description: Color of the unchecked box.

properties.name: --mdc-checkbox-disabled-color
properties.description: Color of the checkbox box and fill when disabled.

properties.name: --mdc-theme-primary
properties.description: Color of a floating, slotted `FloatingLabel` and outline.

properties.name: --mdc-shape-small
properties.description: Radius of the border.

properties.name: --mdc-notched-outline-stroke-width
properties.description: Outline width.

properties.name: --mdc-notched-outline-notch-offset
properties.description: Padding-top to apply to notch when open to compensate for border width box size

properties.name: --mdc-notched-outline-border-color
properties.description: Sets the border / outline color.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-filled-border-radius
properties.description: Border radius of the standard / filled textfield's background filling.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-idle-line-color
properties.description: Color of the filled textfield's bottom line when idle.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-hover-line-color
properties.description: Color of the filled textfield's bottom line when hovering.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-disabled-line-color
properties.description: Color of the filled textfield's bottom line when disabled.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-outlined-idle-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textfield's outline when idle.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-outlined-hover-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textfield's outline when hovering.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-outlined-disabled-border-color
properties.description: Color of the outlined textfield's outline when disabled.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-fill-color
properties.description: Color of the textfield's background fill (non-outlined).

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-disabled-fill-color
properties.description: Color of the textfield's background fill (non-outlined) when disabled.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the input text.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-label-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the non-focused floating label, helper text, char counter, and placeholder.

properties.name: --mdc-text-field-disabled-ink-color
properties.description: Color of the input text, the floating label, helper text, char counter, and placeholder of a disabled textfield.

properties.name: --mdc-drawer-width
properties.description: Width of the side drawer when opened.

properties.name: --mdc-list-vertical-padding
properties.description: Padding before and after the first and last list items.

properties.name: --mdc-list-side-padding
properties.description: Adjusts the padding of the `[padded]` list dividers (also propagates to `mwc-list-item`).

properties.name: --mdc-list-inset-margin
properties.description: Adjusts the left inset padding of an `[inset]` list divider. Typically used for dividing list items with icons.

properties.name: --mdc-list-side-padding
properties.description: Side padding of the list item.

properties.name: --mdc-list-item-meta-size
properties.description: Line height of the meta icon or text and width & height of the slotted parent wrapper.

properties.name: --mdc-list-item-graphic-size
properties.description: Line height of the graphic and width & height of the slotted parent wrapper. `24px` when graphic is `"icon"`. `40px` when graphic is `"avatar"`. `56px` when graphic is `"medium"`, and `"large"`.

properties.name: --mdc-list-item-graphic-margin
properties.description: Margin between the text and graphic. `16px` when graphic is `"avatar"`, `"medium"`, `"large"`, and `"control"`. `32px` when graphic is `"icon"`.

properties.name: --mdc-menu-item-height
properties.description: Height of single-line list-items in the menu.

properties.name: --mdc-menu-min-width
properties.description: Menu min-width.

properties.name: --mdc-menu-max-width
properties.description: Menu max-width.

properties.name: --mdc-menu-max-height
properties.description: Menu max-height.

properties.name: --mdc-menu-z-index
properties.description: Z-index of the popup menu surface.

properties.name: --mdc-circular-progress-bar-color-1
properties.description: Sets the first of the four rotating colors.

properties.name: --mdc-circular-progress-bar-color-2
properties.description: Sets the second of the four rotating colors.

properties.name: --mdc-circular-progress-bar-color-3
properties.description: Sets the third of the four rotating colors.

properties.name: --mdc-circular-progress-bar-color-4
properties.description: Sets the last of the four rotating colors.

properties.name: --mdc-circular-progress-track-color
properties.description: Sets the track color of the determinate progress bar.
